definition[0]: the seventh letter of the English alphabet
definition[1]: the fifth note in the musical scale of C major or the musical key based on this note
definition[2]: used to describe a film that has been officially approved as suitable for people of any age
definition[3]: a unit for measuring the force caused by gravity on an object as it starts to move faster and faster
example[0]: Astronauts endure a force of several G’s during take-off.
definition[5]: a written abbreviation of  gram or grams
